products.title: Affinity, Plaster - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity blind in plaster offers a fresh take on cream, infused with just a hint of buttery yellow to give this blind a richer tone without being overpowering or overtly gold. The affinity patterning adds that touch of chic class that you have been looking for. The subtle glowing quality of the affinity plaster make this blind an ideal addition to a decadent yet tasteful bedroom or living room, where it couples well with traditional wooden features.

products.title: Affinity, Storm - Roller Blind
products.description: The lightweight, easy-to-use affinity storm is comprised of a dark grey backdrop fabric covered with a high quality, stitched pattern that reduces the light coming in from outdoors without having the full influence of a blackout blind. The way that the pattern is stitched allows the affinity storm to gently shine, giving it a modern and chic quality. Try contrasting with dark blues or purples in the living room to provide a rich, opulent colour scheme, or use the affinity patterning to provide character in a much more colour-neutral hallway or landing.

products.title: Affinity, Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity in silver combines the distinctive affinity patterning with a barely-there silver fabric to provide a truly stunning interaction between room light and blind, making an ethereal addition to any home. This pretty fabric keeps out enough of the outside world to offer privacy, yet won't totally blackout a room. Couple the affinity silver with a dark navy for a moody yet beautiful bedroom colour scheme, or add a hint of sophistication to a monochrome dining room.

products.title: Affinity, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity pure takes a lightweight, easy-hanging white fabric with a subtle hint of cream, and uses it to host a pure white, modern pattern. The contrast between the stitching and fabric adds interest to an otherwise neutral blind. Use the affinity pure as part of a fresh, neutral colour scheme in a living room or home office. Or make a real feature of it, by setting it amongst brightly painted walls to make it really stand out in a colourful bedroom or playroom.

products.title: Affinity, Touch - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for an off-white, patterned blind that oozes class and sophistication, then the affinity touch could be the one you've been looking for. The beautifully lightweight fabric displays the carefully stitiched, signature affinity pattern to give the touch an elegant, tasteful feel. The affinity touch will complement bolder colours well, particularly deep browns, rich purples, and shimmering golds, making it the ideal addition to living rooms and dining rooms, whether contemporary or traditional.

products.title: Affinity, Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity blind in black is a lightly patterned fabric that offers great protection from the outside light, whilst still providing style and elegance. The easy-to-use roller-blind is durable, lightweight, and high quality; everything one looks for in a home blind. The delicate patterning of the affinity black looks can add interest to monochrome dcor schemes, where blacks, greys, and whites win the day.

products.title: Affinity, Touch - Vertical Blind
products.description: The affinity touch is close to pure white, but without the stark brightness, and has a pretty scattered patterning over the top. This simple and attractive blind is made from an enduring, textured fabric, and offers effective light-filtering properties to allow the light in whilst offering privacy. Use in the bedroom for a romantic, wistful feel, without compromising on contemporary design. Surround with dusky pinks or muted greens for country, summery look all year round, and accessorise with brushed golds and cast iron furniture.

products.title: Affinity, Silver - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's silver combines a shimmering fabric background with raised, pretty patterning to craft a pretty yet unobtrusive filter blind. A robust vertical blind, the neatly hanging louvres will work effortlessly open and close on demand. The silver can sit as a soft window feature against white walls and light woods to create a modern take on traditional styling in a living room or bedroom. Or use it with dark greys and silver accessories for a cool, one-of-a-kind look in your bathroom or hallway.

products.title: Affinity, Storm - Vertical Blind
products.description: The muted grey of the affinity storm is offset by the raised stitched pattern that covers the blind from head to toe. This pretty blind does little to give away the resilience of its high quality fabric, yet it is nonetheless durable and long-lasting. The storm would suit a fresh, contemporary dining room, in combination with white walls and glass furniture, and would work brilliantly as an attractive window feature in an otherwise plain downstairs cloakroom, hallway, or utility room.

products.title: Affinity, Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The leaf-like patterning of the affinity pure will light up a room's dcor and you'll be sure to notice it catching the light. This blind blends class with functionality, as its cutting edge filter fabric and no-fuss louvres make this a usable and durable window covering. Go cool and fresh in the kitchen by setting the pure against sky blue walls and light, natural woods. This blind would also make a pretty addition to a guest or master bedroom, where tranquillity and calm rule the roost.

products.title: Affinity, Plaster - Vertical Blind
products.description: Affinity's plaster is warm and welcoming, and creates a homely, classic feel in any room, whilst maintaining a feeling of contemporary, modern-day style. Its louvre's tilting mechanism is simple and easy to use, so that can let light in or keep it out as you see fit. The plaster will sit pretty amidst dark browns and medium woods, whether in the living room, bedroom, hallway, or anywhere else you would like a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

products.title: Affinity, Black - Vertical Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the affinity black is a bold and contemporary choice of blind, yet with a traditional scattered pattern sitting gently on top. This is a blind that exists only to stand up and be noticed, and there is certainly no missing it. Design a monochrome home office space by making the black its central feature, and surrounding it with stark whites and cool greys. Add a splash of colour if you like, using bright citrus shades, a bold red, or creamy pastels.
